building.label: Aphra_Theatre
building.description: The Aphra Theatre is a courtyard-style gallery theatre space organised by the School of Arts.

building.label: Becket_Court
building.description: Named after Thomas Becket and located adjacent to Eliot College, Becket Court offers en suite rooms on a bed and bistro basis.

building.label: Bishopden_Court
building.description: Bishopden Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Boiler_House
building.description: The Boiler House is a large workshop run by the School of Arts, ideal for large-scale 3D work.

building.label: Bossenden_Court
building.description: As one of the Parkwood Flats, Bossenden Court offers spacious en-suite rooms and a shared kitchen.

building.label: Campus_Watch
building.description: The Campus Watch headquarters are the place to go for any security concerns you may have around campus.

building.label: Careers_Employability_Service
building.description: The Careers Employability Service helps students with all aspects of career planning and decision-making. Opening hours: Monday 10.30am-5pm, Tuesday-Friday 9am-5pm.

building.label: Clowes_Court
building.description: Clowes Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Colyer_Fergusson
building.description: A purpose-built, flexible performance space that can accommodate a wide range of musical activities.

building.label: Cornwallis_George_Allen_Wing
building.description: The George Allen Wing houses the School of European Culture and Languages as well as the Knowledge Management Centre for the School of Social Policy, Sociology and Social Research.

building.label: Cornwallis_Mathematics_Institute
building.description: The Cornwallis Mathematics Institute houses the main Mathematics lecture theatre along with the McVittie Library.

building.label: Cornwallis_North_East
building.description: Cornwallis North East contains 3 classrooms for the School of Social Policy, Sociology and Social Research.

building.label: Cornwallis_North_West
building.description: Cornwallis North West has a variety of teaching spaces for the School of European Culture and Languages as well as a large central quad area.

building.label: Cornwallis_South_East
building.description: Cornwallis South East contains many computer facilities along with two large lecture rooms.

building.label: Cornwallis_South_West
building.description: Cornwallis South West consists of three computer rooms used by the School of Computing.

building.label: Cornwallis_South
building.description: Cornwallis South is home to the School of Computing consisting of three computer rooms and two class rooms.

building.label: Cornwallis_West
building.description: Cornwallis West contains four offices and a seminar room for the School of European Culture and Languages.

building.label: Darwin_College
building.description: Darwin College is the fourth oldest of the Kent colleges. It contains a variety of teaching, seminar and office rooms which are used by many subject areas. Also home to the very popular in-house bar and bistro - Origins.

building.label: Darwin_Houses
building.description: Rooms in the Darwin Houses have their own sink along with shared toilet and shower facilities. Rooms are arranged in corridors of 5 single rooms over four floors, with access to shared kitchens.

building.label: Denstead_Court
building.description: Denstead Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Eliot_College
building.description: Eliot College is the oldest of the Kent colleges. Consisting of accommodation alongside large multipurpose rooms, it is situated right in the heart of the campus.

building.label: Ellenden_Court
building.description: Ellenden Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Estates_Department
building.description: The Estates Department provides a number of essential services to the University of Kent and is responsible for managing, maintaining and developing the infrastructure and building fabric of the various campuses.

building.label: Farthings_Court
building.description: Farthings Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Grimshill_Court
building.description: Grimshill Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Ground_Maintenance
building.description: The Grounds Maintenance team has a responsibility to ensure that the University grounds are maintained to an agreed standard, based upon a detailed specification.

building.label: Gulbenkian
building.description: Gulbenkian is a key part of the University of Kent's Arts Centre offering innovative, engaging and high quality arts activity for and with the public, staff and students.

building.label: Homestall_Court
building.description: Homestall Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Hothe_Court
building.description: Hothe Court houses have shower and toilet facilities upstairs, with an additional downstairs toilet. The kitchen/diner has an oven and hob, fridge/freezer and microwave.

building.label: Ingram
building.description: Ingram is home to the Physics department and houses four large lab spaces as well as a lecture theatre and several classrooms.

building.label: Innovation_Center
building.description: The Innovation Centre houses over 2500 sq. metres of modern, affordable office, studio and workshop space set amongst 500 acres of green parkland, overlooking the beautiful cathedral city of Canterbury.

building.label: Jarman
building.description: The Jarman building is the centre of Arts for the Canterbury campus. It offers professional standard drama, and film production studios as well as teaching rooms, social spaces and a dedicated centre for postgraduate students.

building.label: Jennison
building.description: The Jennison building is home to the School of Engineering and Digital Arts, including four large computer suites and various production rooms as well as a large engineering lab.

building.label: Kemsdale_Court
building.description: As one of the Parkwood Flats, Kemsdale Court offers spacious en-suite rooms and a shared kitchen.

building.label: Kent_Business_School
building.description: The Kent Business School contains five seminar rooms, an IT suite, a lecture theatre and a large symposium room.

building.label: Kent_Enterprise_Hub
building.description: The Kent Enterprise business incubation and support unit is devoted to helping student, graduate and staff start-up ventures and early stage companies to increase survival rates.

building.label: Kent_Law_School
building.description: The law school is part of the Eliot College Extension and comprises of several teaching and meeting rooms.

building.label: Keynes_College
building.description: Keynes College is now one of the biggest colleges on the Canterbury Campus and has rooms for catered and self-catered students. Keynes College boast an expanded Dolche Vita where catered students are provided with breakfast and dinner.

building.label: Keynes_Flats
building.description: Rooms in the Keynes Flats have en-suite bathrooms and are self-catered. The flats are brand new and provide a very high standard of living including broadband computer links and laundry services.

building.label: Keynes_Houses
building.description: In each of the Keynes Houses, 9 people share the accommodation over three floors. The ground floor has a spacious kitchen and one bedroom with en suite facilities. There are four rooms on both the first and second floors, with two sets of shower and toilet facilities on each floor.
